name: Remove All Adverts in 'SourceForge'
description:
This nifty code will remove (pretty much) all advertisements in SourceFourge.net, whilst clearing space in the process!
INCLUDING removal of those big 2 third of page consuming eyesore, in the way, on-download page forms!!! 
WITHOUT compromising the information you -REALLY- want! 

Last up-dated [Sunday, 10 October 2010], Built around [Firefox], On a [Ubuntu] operating system - based on [Linux] - Based on [Unix]...
